sentences.en: Archaeologists dated the fossil after much study.
sentences.cn: 经过认真地研究后,考古学家们最后确定了该化石的年代.

sentences.en: Biologists now wonder how many traits of living and fossil organisms have evolved in this way.
sentences.cn: 生物学家目前正在捉摸,在现有生物和过去生物的各种特征中有多少特征是由上面所说的这种方式演变而来的.

sentences.en: Can you date the fossil exactly?
sentences.cn: 你能确定这化石的确切年代 吗 ?

sentences.en: Clearer fossil may provide a definitive answer.
sentences.cn: 清晰的化石可能会提供明确的答案。

sentences.en: Fossil hunters have unearthed the bones of an elephant believed to be 500,000 years old.
sentences.cn: 化石搜集者们发掘出了一具大象骨骼，据信距今已有50万年。

sentences.en: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.cn: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.en: I wonder what environment of deposition was required to preserve this fossil so well.
sentences.cn: 我想知道是什么样的沉积环境才能将这个化石保存得这么好。

sentences.en: Isn't Professor Bell an old fossil?
sentences.cn: 贝尔教授真是个老顽固.

sentences.en: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ) .
sentences.cn: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

sentences.en: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).
sentences.cn: 海绵动物留下了漫长的化石记录。

sentences.en: Our literature teacher is an old fossil.
sentences.cn: 我们的文学老师是个老顽固.

sentences.en: Peter Forey is curator of fossil fishes at the Natural History Museum.
sentences.cn: 彼得·福雷是自然历史博物馆鱼类化石展厅的负责人。

sentences.en: She is an old fossil.
sentences.cn: 她是个老顽固.

sentences.en: The answers may lie in a close reexamination of the fossil evidence.
sentences.cn: 通过对化石证据的仔细反复的研究是可以得出答案的.

sentences.en: The electricity industry consumes large amounts of fossil fuels.
sentences.cn: 电力工业消耗大量的矿物燃料。

sentences.en: The fossil fuels (coal and oil) are finite resources.
sentences.cn: 化石燃料（如煤和石油）属于有限资源。

sentences.en: The man is a fossil.
sentences.cn: 那人是个老顽固.

sentences.en: They can be misidentified easily in the subsurface as fossil offshore bars.
sentences.cn: 它们在地下深处最易于与石化了的滨外沙洲混淆起来.

sentences.en: This dependency between fossil and living types is well illustrated when we deal with extinct groups.
sentences.cn: 化石与现存类型之间的这种依赖关系在我们研究绝灭类群时是十分明显的.

sentences.en: We see plants and animal fossils, but we never see a fossil of one kind of animal changing into another kind.
sentences.cn: 我们看见植物和动物化石， 但我们从未看见一种动物改变到另一种动物的化石。

words.tran_cn: 石化（fossilize的过去式和过去分词）
变成化石；变陈腐；使过时或固定不变；搜集（或发掘）化石标本

phrases.tran_cn: [生]活化石；[口]落后于时代的人

trans.tran_cn: 化石，僵化的事物，老顽固，食古不化的人，习语中保存的旧词
trans.tran_en: an animal or plant that lived many thousands of years ago and that has been preserved, or the shape of one of these animals or plants that has been preserved in rock
